title: LLM Tests Configuration
description: Configuration for Windows MCP Server LLM integration tests

agentBenchmarkPath.description: Path to agent-benchmark. For 'executable' mode: path to .exe file. For 'go-run' mode: path to Go project directory. Can be absolute or relative to this config file. If null, downloads from GitHub releases.

agentBenchmarkMode.description: How to run agent-benchmark. 'executable': run a compiled binary. 'go-run': run dynamically with 'go run .' in the project directory.

verbose.description: Show detailed output during test execution

build.description: Build the MCP server before running tests
